abstract: Donald J Trump supporters pine for glimpse of Republican presidential candidate at World Golf Championships, which is played at Doral, Fla, resort he owns; PGA has moved to dissociate itself from candidate's controversial statements, complicating its relationship with several Trump-owned properties.
lead_paragraph: Trump’s ascendant political profile may lead him to maintain a lower profile at the World Golf Championships event at Doral Resort and Spa in Florida.

headline.main: Politics Edge Onto the Greens at a Course Owned by Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: Politics Edge Onto the Greens at a Course Owned by Trump

snippet: Trump’s ascendant political profile may lead him to maintain a lower profile at the World Golf Championships event at Doral Resort and Spa in Florida.
